column2: "Once ARKS operatives reach a certain level of skill, they are granted approval for extended Subpalettes."
"And it's up to officers like me to determine whether they are ready or not."
"That's because a full subpalette is a hindrance rather than a help to an inexperienced operative."
"But I digress. The test required for extended subpalette approval consists of gathering certain items."
"Whether or not you take this test is completely up to you. My job is merely to evaluate your performance."
